pros: A great place to foster a community of young individuals that want impact

job_title: Director of Social Development Projects in Helsinki, Southern Finland
pros:
True international environment, I had worked in a team of 7 people from 6 different countries, attended international congress with 800 people from all over the world.
Great challenges and learning all the times.
Working with motivating and bright people.
cons:
Low salary, as it is an NGO.
Stressful sometimes, too many things to do with small resources
